title: ArtnCraftStore
description: Art Fizz is a dynamic web application built using React and Vite, designed to create a seamless experience for art enthusiasts.

title: VolunAid
description: Volun Aid provides a seamless and secure platform for connecting volunteers with opportunities. Users can easily post and apply for volunteer roles, manage their postings, and explore opportunities through customizable views.

title: BlissAbode
description: Bliss Abode is a comprehensive platform for finding dream homes, offering secure multi-option authentication, curated property listings, favorites management, profile updates, and detailed property info for logged-in users.
